Articles.Content:
Majiir hasn't got back to me yet about Kethane, so I will release the "debug" version instead. Right now I'm just fixing a few things that were broken by 0.20 first.

Will get back to you SoonÃ¢â€žÂ¢. Working on things right now.

Will get back to you SoonÃ¢â€žÂ¢. Working on things right now.

Thank you!!

WIN!

(10 char)
suh-weeet. So much anticipation
im going to be so happy when this comes out debug our not
Same with me
Yes! I have plans, (for my kerbals) for them to prosper and not be harmed. And this mod could play a vital part in it.
Hurray, I can launch my Defense Satellite that is too heavy to fly correctly on kerbin!

Can't wait for this plugin to be released!*

*=Well, I can, but this seems FREAKING AWESOME!
Wow! I can't wait! I've always wanted a mod like this
I have many Ideas for minmus
The list of awesome mods I need to add to my game just keeps growing. Yay.
will you be releasing the debug version or are you going to wait for the kethane stuff
Have a heavy spacecraft? Build a Gilly base, Build it on Gilly, Problemo Solved
If Scott Manly uses this. It will take his Reusable space program series to a whole new level!

Update everyone: The launching code is now 0.20-compatible (in fact, it works better in 0.20 than it did in 0.19, because Squad fixed whatever was causing the staging to be lost). Majiir gave me permission to release a dev version of the modified Kethane plugin; this is only temporary because he is planning on allowing this with the stock Kethane. So, if everything goes well, I should be able to release it this evening.

[There was an image here before]

(insert soundeffects here)

Edited June 11, 2013 by Greys
Yes i can finally make my evil army on mun! i mean scientific research facility
Sounds good, I look forward to using this!
omg yes!!!! i can't wait
OH MY GOOD LORD, I'm very excited.!!

I'm crying, I've been waiting for this for so long.

Thank you so much Skykooler!
Great news (Y) This will make concquering the galaxy easier haha cheers!
Definitely looking forward to this...

Just confirming that skykooler has my permission to release a modified Kethane version. I'll do my best to support his modification until I get multiple-resources support added to the main build. (I'm aiming to have that done by the 0.6 release of Kethane.) If you have issues with the modified Kethane build, please post them here (or wherever skykooler accepts reports for his mod) so those reports don't get confused with the main build.

And, of course, I am also looking forward to this release!
